pages.text: When something mentions that it $(o)"binds"$() a mobs hands this means that the mob's or player's hands have or will be effectively disabled, usually for a very brief period. $(br2)While in this state a bound hand holding an item cannot parry or be used to attack leaving someone open to attacks and other follow ups freely.
Sources of bind include some skill types and being $(#CCCC00)stunned,$()$(#CCCC00)$(l)knocked down$() or $(#FF0000)$(l)exposed$() throughout combat.
